Name.description: The name of the tax rate.
The name of the tax component.

IsCompound.description: Specifies whether the tax component is compound.

IsNonRecoverable.description: Specifies whether the tax component is non-recoverable.

Rate.description: The rate of the tax component.

Status.description: The status of the tax rate.

CanApplyToAssets.description: Specifies whether the tax rate can be applied to assets.

CanApplyToEquity.description: Specifies whether the tax rate can be applied to equity.

CanApplyToExpenses.description: Specifies whether the tax rate can be applied to expenses.

CanApplyToLiabilities.description: Specifies whether the tax rate can be applied to liabilities.

CanApplyToRevenue.description: Specifies whether the tax rate can be applied to revenue.

DisplayTaxRate.description: The tax rate displayed for reporting purposes.
